aboutpage.title: Pera Legal & Partners
aboutpage.desc1: Pera Legal & Partners was founded by experienced lawyers who have served in public legal institutions for over 20 years, together with young, dynamic lawyers with strong academic backgrounds. Our law firm, led by expert founding attorneys and supported by our experienced staff, aims to reach fast, lawful, and accurate results while keeping our clients informed of every development and taking the necessary steps at the right time.
aboutpage.desc2: Pera Legal & Partners operates in Beyoğlu. For appointments, suggestions, or complaints, you may use the contact information provided on the Contact page.

practice.subtitle: Pera Legal & Partners
practice.title: Our Practice Areas
practice.desc: We provide reliable, efficient and result-oriented legal solutions with our experienced team to deliver legal support at the right time, with the right method and at high standards.

ceza.title: Criminal Law
ceza.desc: As one of our core areas of expertise, we protect our clients’ rights at every stage of criminal proceedings with the utmost sensitivity required by the field. As strong advocates of justice, we work determinedly to ensure that justice prevails while defending clients against accusations.

bilişim.title: IT & Cyber Law
bilişim.desc: In today’s rapidly evolving digital world, IT law plays a key role in protecting data privacy, defending against cyberattacks, and establishing the legal framework for digital transactions. We guide our clients safely through the digital landscape while embracing innovation.

aile.title: Family Law
aile.desc: Family Law brings together emotional and legal sensitivity. In matters such as divorce, custody, and property division, we provide legal solutions that respect family values and protect our clients' future.

ticaret.title: Commercial Law
ticaret.desc: In the fast-changing world of commerce, our primary goal is to offer legal solutions tailored to business needs. From company formation to contract management, we guide our clients at every step and contribute to sustainable commercial growth.

iş.title: Labor Law
iş.desc: We specialize in Labor Law to protect employee rights and ensure fair employer practices. We provide legal guidance to maintain healthy and lawful employment relationships within the dynamic structure of business life.

gayri.title: Real Estate Law
gayri.desc: Real estate and property transactions mark important milestones in life. We offer legal support for a broad range of matters such as title deed procedures and lease agreements, helping clients manage their property rights securely.

miras.title: Inheritance Law
miras.desc: Inheritance represents the continuation of family bonds and personal assets. We provide sensitive and fair legal guidance to ensure proper distribution of estates and protect our clients’ rights during inheritance processes.

idare.title: Administrative Law
idare.desc: Administrative Law governs the regulation of public services and the supervision of administrative actions. We provide legal support to protect individual rights and maintain a fair balance between the state and citizens.

saglık.title: Health Law
saglık.desc: Healthcare is one of the most fundamental human needs, and health law regulates this critical area. We guide healthcare professionals and institutions in compliance with legal requirements while safeguarding patient rights.

icra.title: Enforcement & Bankruptcy Law
icra.desc: Enforcement and bankruptcy law governs the collection of debts and the regulation of debtors' financial situations. By following current regulations in Türkiye, we offer fast and fair solutions for both creditors and debtors.

sozlesme.title: Contract Law
sozlesme.desc: Contract Law sets the legal framework for agreements between parties. We provide consultancy in the formation, execution, interpretation, amendment, and termination of contracts with our expert legal team.

vatan.title: Citizenship Law
vatan.desc: Citizenship Law covers the acquisition, loss, and transfer of citizenship. We assist foreign nationals with residence permits, work permits, family visas, and citizenship applications with a professional and result-oriented approach.

sigorta.title: Insurance Law
sigorta.desc: We meticulously protect our clients’ rights in disputes arising from insurance contracts. We offer effective representation in matters involving insurance companies, including compensation claims and policy interpretations.

teamPreview.subtitle: FOR YOUR LEGAL SOLUTIONS
teamPreview.title: Our Team
teamPreview.desc: Our experienced, skilled and well-equipped lawyers at Pera Legal & Partners provide the legal support our clients need with up-to-date knowledge, transparency and a results-oriented mindset.

about.heroSubtitle: Pera Legal & Partners — Trust, Ethics and Solution-Oriented Legal Services
about.whoWeAreP1: Pera Legal & Partners is a corporate law firm offering fast, reliable and result-oriented legal solutions with its team of lawyers specialized in various fields of law.
about.whoWeAreP2: We combine a modern legal approach with ethical values, transparency and strong communication to provide each client with a professional roadmap.
about.missionText: To provide professional, transparent and solution-oriented legal consultancy that enables clients to make the right decisions in their legal processes.
about.visionText: To be a reliable, ethical and innovative legal solution partner on both national and international platforms.

halil.name: Halil Cenk Akdoğan
halil.title: Attorney at Law
halil.about: He graduated from Eastern Mediterranean University in 2004. Following his graduation, he first practiced law in İzmir and has been working independently in his own office in Istanbul since 2012. Throughout his career, he has achieved significant success especially in administrative law, family law, commercial law, corporate law, and enforcement & bankruptcy law. His arguments and legal opinions in many cases he won have been adopted by high courts and turned into precedent-setting decisions.

muhammed.name: Muhammed Murat Kaplan
muhammed.title: Attorney at Law
muhammed.about: After completing his legal education at Istanbul Beykent University in 2021, he began his legal internship. Immediately after his internship, he continued his practice independently. He plays an active role particularly in administrative law, civil society law, corporate law, and enforcement & bankruptcy law. He specializes in resolving disputes arising from administrative acts, ensuring compliance for NGOs such as associations and foundations, overseeing business transfers, mergers and liquidations, and the rapid and effective collection of commercial receivables.

recai.name: Recai Aytaç Akbay
recai.title: Attorney at Law
recai.about: He graduated from Ankara University Faculty of Law in 1982 and began his judicial career as a judge in 1986. During his tenure, he presided over various courts including civil courts of first instance, commercial courts, civil courts of peace, enforcement courts, and high criminal courts. After retiring in 2022 following more than 30 years of judicial service, he began practicing as an attorney, offering clients practical and solution-oriented legal services by combining his long-standing judicial experience with his legal practice.

tolga.name: Tolga Erkoçkar
tolga.title: Atty. & Mediator
tolga.about: He completed his secondary education at Mimar Sinan High School and then graduated from Marmara University Faculty of Law. In 2014, he also earned a degree from Marmara University's Faculty of Communication, Department of Journalism. After establishing his own law office, he completed his LL.M. at Kadir Has University. He was later accepted into Galatasaray University's PhD program, where he has completed the coursework and proficiency stages, continuing his dissertation titled 'Employer’s Obligation of Non-Discrimination and Equal Pay for Equal Work'. He provides consultancy mainly in labor law, contract law, and commercial law. He speaks professional-level English and has one published book and one peer-reviewed article.

cansu.name: Cansu Işıksal
cansu.title: Atty. & Mediator
cansu.about: She completed her secondary education at Mimar Sinan High School and later graduated from Marmara University Faculty of Law. She also holds a degree from Marmara University Faculty of Communication, Department of Journalism. After completing her legal internship, she founded her own practice and earned her LL.M. from Kadir Has University. She specializes in labor law, contract law, and commercial law and provides consultancy in various areas of private law.

muge.name: Müge Yavuz
muge.title: Attorney at Law
muge.about: She began her education at VKV Koç Private Primary School and continued at Istanbul Saint Joseph French High School. During her high school years, she attended programs at Paris-Sorbonne University, gaining an international perspective. She graduated from Istanbul Bilgi University Faculty of Law. After gaining experience in leading law firms in Turkey, she joined our firm in 2022. She provides legal services to domestic and international clients mainly in criminal law, IT law, and corporate law. She speaks advanced English and French and has held secretary positions at multiple committees of the Istanbul Bar Association.

hatice.name: Hatice Yazar
hatice.title: Attorney at Law
hatice.about: She graduated from Marmara University Faculty of Law in 2015. For over seven years, she has provided legal consultancy to her clients in criminal law, enforcement & bankruptcy law, family law, and labor law.

furkan.name: Furkan Uslu
furkan.title: Trainee Lawyer
furkan.about: He graduated from Istanbul Beykent University in 2024. He is currently continuing his compulsory legal internship, gaining experience in practical areas of the profession.

selin.name: Selin Alçık
selin.title: Attorney at Law
selin.about: She was admitted to Maltepe University Faculty of Law with a scholarship. After graduating, she completed her legal internship in 2024 at one of the leading law firms in Turkey. She speaks advanced English and has specialized in administrative law, enforcement & bankruptcy law, civil law, and corporate law.

hayrun.name: Hayrunnisa Neslihan Varlı
hayrun.title: Attorney at Law
hayrun.about: She completed her undergraduate and graduate studies at Istanbul Beykent University Faculty of Law. With an academic background in private law, she focused particularly on international trade law, transport law, and contract law. She currently resides in Germany and actively practices law in both Turkey and Germany, offering consultancy in private law, international trade law, and immigration law.

hakki.name: Hakkı Taylan Yurtaydın
hakki.title: Attorney at Law
hakki.about: He graduated from Marmara University Faculty of Law in 2005. He is currently preparing his LL.M. thesis titled 'Vertical Integration in Energy Companies' at Kadir Has University. He previously played basketball for MTA Ankara and later for Marmara University Faculty of Law, and currently plays for the Istanbul Bar Association Basketball Team. He specializes in commercial law, contract law, civil law, transport law, and CMR. He speaks advanced English.

ata.name: Ata Taşman
ata.title: Legal Consultant
ata.about: After graduating from Terakki Foundation Schools, he was admitted to the University of Exeter Faculty of Law in the United Kingdom and graduated in 2023. He gained experience in various companies and his own ventures and also served in multiple United Nations organizations. He currently works as a legal consultant, providing comprehensive and solution-oriented services in international contracts and cross-border commercial relations.
